availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Merry C. Hazelip (Edmonson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Edmonson County, Kentucky, farmer. Buncombe County, North Carolina, native. Married to Jane B. Wesley Hazelip. Father of William Hazelip, Parrum S. Hazelip, Lewis Matthew Hazelip, Hiram M. Hazelip, Ransom Cochran Hazelip, Docklin Warner Hazelip, and Mary "Polly" Ann Hazelip. Farmer in Edmonson County in 1850. Farmer in Edmonson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, p. 43A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, Brownsville, p. 17.
Find A Grave, "Merry C. Hazelip (1795-1870)," Memorial #22285224, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/22285224 (accessed May 19, 2020).
